===Etymology===
{{bor|zh|ug|ياخشى||good}}. From a {{w|Xinjiang}} musical dance program on the 2010 {{w|CCTV New Year's Gala}}, named ''[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=esU0-pUB1Zo The Party's Policy - Yaxshi!]'' ({{lang|zh|[[黨]][[的]][[政策]]亞克西}}), felt by many to be overly propagandizing.
